TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to enter details in mandatory fields of vehicle form.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Vehicle Tab
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Vehicle Tab
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Vehicle Tab

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter vehicle registration no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter vehicle registration no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter vehicle registration no.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter vehicle ref no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter vehicle ref no.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter vehicle ref no.
